ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Bottom half of song (minor spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: people have done this solo, as long as you can chant kite while blind heh. i took a 56 ranger and 53 druid friends.  i was going to try solo, but they were in
ygData.messageBody:
people have done this solo, as long as you can chant kite while blind heh.
i took a 56 ranger and 53 druid friends. i was going to try solo, but they
were in the same zone. i hardly ever solo, so i would have probably died or
tried running my ass off blind. we single pulled the greens with harmony.
used sneak to turn in the item, and the cool thing was that maligar was
still harmonied, so when the doppelganger spawned maligar didn't join in the
fight. his dark gets through even super high MR, but 2 friends 50+ should
be more than enough.

Shada

> He con threateningly and was blue to me at 51. All his
> guards were green to
> me. At least three agroed on me when I got into their range.
> I'm not sure
> if Maligar was one of them. I am a bit loathe to try again,
> as I would have
> bit it that time if I hadn't had boffo hp (had just come from
> killing Vox,
> got a magic bag!).
>
> Elfson Allegro 52(finally) Veeshan
